description: No Mise en Plastic is an initiative aimed at helping chefs reduce single-use plastic and food waste in their kitchens. Initially focused on plastic reduction, the organization has evolved to emphasize sustainable sourcing and innovative food waste solutions.  Through workshops, a comprehensive manual, and a platform called Today's Menu, No Me's on Plastic engages chefs globally, building relationships with local producers and encouraging them to adopt environmentally friendly practices and create positive food trends.
name: No Mise en Plastic
